        public DiceArena(int numberOfDice,

    • Method Detail

      • getArena

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getArena()

      • getRepresentation

        public java.lang.String getRepresentation()
        before sending the representation of the dice in the draft pool, it call the update representation method
        Returns:
        the representation of the dice in the draft pool

      • rollDiceIntoArena

        public void rollDiceIntoArena()
        This method is invoked every time a round starts. It rolls n dice into the arena where n is the number of players in the game multiplied by 2 and added 1

      • removeDieFromDiceArena

        public void removeDieFromDiceArena(int idDie)
        This method is needed for tool card n. 11, where you have to remove one single die from the draft pool
        Parameters:
        idDie - dieId that needs to be removed from the draft pool

      • rollOneDieIntoDiceArena

        public void rollOneDieIntoDiceArena(int positionInDiceArena,
                                    int actualIdDie,
                                    int value)
        This method is needed for tool card n.11 where you have to roll one single die in the draft pool after removing one. The new die is set in the same position where the old one was.
        Parameters:
        positionInDiceArena - position of the die removed at the beginning of tool card 11
        actualIdDie - dieId that is gonna be set in the draft pool
        value - value chosen by the player to give to the die

      • rerollDiceArena

        public void rerollDiceArena(RoundTrack roundTrack,
                            Player player)
                     throws RoundTrackNotInSecondPartOfRoundException,
                            PlayerHasAlreadySetDieThisTurnException
        This method is used in tool card n.7 and it re-rolls all the dice into the draft pool
        Parameters:
        roundTrack - needed to check if it is past first round
        player - player id performing the move needed to check whether he placed a die already
        Throws:
        RoundTrackNotInSecondPartOfRoundException - when the player tries to use tool card 7 during the first turn
        PlayerHasAlreadySetDieThisTurnException - when the player tries to use tool card 7 after setting a die

      • swapDie

        public void swapDie(int dieIdToRemove,
                    int dieIdToAdd)
             throws DieNotPresentException
        This method is used for tool card n. 5 where the player wants to swap a die among draft pool and round track
        Parameters:
        dieIdToRemove - id die to remove from the draft pool
        dieIdToAdd - id die to add to the draft pool
        Throws:
        DieNotPresentException - if dieIdToRemove is not present in the draft pool
